Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urination Disorders/Glycosuria
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Glucose Metabolism Disorders/Glycosuria
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: The appearance of an abnormally large amount of GLUCOSE in the urine, such as more than 500 mg/day in adults. It can be due to HYPERGLYCEMIA or genetic defects in renal reabsorption (RENAL GLYCOSURIA).
